author: Geoffrey Seiler
description: Apple has created a strong closed-loop business model that seamlessly connects its devices and keeps its content within its walled garden. This has led to a locked-in user base and high-margin service revenue growth, but the company faces potential risks from its revenue-sharing agreement with Alphabet.
